title: Low-fat apple, banana and cinnamon muffins
ingredients: ['For the muffins', '255g (9 oz) self-raising flour', '100g (4 oz) caster sugar', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '340ml (12 fl oz) skimmed milk', '2 large bananas, mashed', '2 Granny Smith apples - peeled, cored and grated', '1 tablespoon grated orange zest', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', 'For the icing', '50g (2 oz) caster sugar', '3 tablespoons water', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon']
